Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2007 02:47AM Groovygaia wrote: I just had a treatment yesterday - taxol...which means that I only have one treatment left!!! Jan 18th and I'm done! Since I had the bi-lat mast I won't require radiation, and my Onc. said I could have my medi-port out when I have my silicone surgery in March. I feel like the end of the tunnel actually has a light!
